# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="d51b3-102">清空收件箱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d51b3-103">**"我的收件箱" 为空**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-103">**My inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d51b3-104">Firefox 浏览器中的某些加载项可能会阻止您的收件箱加载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d51b3-105">若要了解如何[禁用或删除加载项](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons), 请访问 Firefox 支持。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [Disable or remove Add-ons](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d51b3-106">**我想清空我的收件箱**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d51b3-107">如果要清空收件箱并删除所有电子邮件, 请执行以下操作:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d51b3-108">选择圆圈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d51b3-109">在邮件列表顶部的["收件箱](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox)" 旁边, 选择所有邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d51b3-110">在页面顶部, 选择 "**空文件夹**" (如果重点\*\*\*\* / \*\*\*\* 收件箱打开, 则选择空的 "空")。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d51b3-111">选择 "**全部删除**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d51b3-112">若要清除所有已删除的邮件, 请打开 "[已删除](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems)邮件" 文件夹并选择 "**清空文件夹** > **全部删除**", 然后选择 "恢复在页面顶部**从该文件夹删除的项目**", 然后再次选择 "**清空文件夹**".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d51b3-113">有关详细信息, 请参阅[在 Outlook.com 中删除电子邮件](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d51b3-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
